SmartTab Manager+ is an intelligent tab management system designed to enhance your browsing productivity. Keep your tabs organized automatically and manage your browser resources efficiently.

Key Features:
- Automatic Tab Grouping: Intelligently groups tabs by domain for better organization
- Memory Management: Monitor and optimize browser memory usage
- Smart Search: Quickly find any tab or bookmark with instant search
- Bookmark Organization: Easy access to bookmarks with folder support
- Most Visited Sites: Quick access to your frequently visited websites
- Tab Statistics: Track your open tabs and memory usage

Advanced Features:
- Dark Mode Support: Comfortable browsing in any lighting condition
- Inactive Tab Management: Automatically close inactive tabs to save resources
- Custom Settings: Personalize the extension to match your workflow
- Compact View: Choose between regular and space-efficient layouts

Perfect for:
- Power users who work with many tabs
- Professionals managing multiple web resources
- Anyone looking to organize their browser better
- Users concerned about browser memory usage

Stay organized, save memory, and boost your productivity with SmartTab Manager+.

Support the developer: https://buymeacoffee.com/anjan50
